original_title: Former NLB Director Thusitha Halloluwa remanded
original_body_lines: Former Executive Director of the National Lotteries Board (NLB), Thusitha Halloluwa, has been remanded until August 28 by the Colombo Magistrate’s Court, said Ada Derana reporter.
Colombo Additional Magistrate Pasan Amarasena issued the order after considering the facts presented by officers of the Colombo Crimes Division (CCD) and the defense counsel.
